title: Opinion: I was an undocumented immigrant. Now I’m a doctor watching the immigration crackdown keep my patients from seeking care
description: Public health and immigration enforcement cannot safely occupy the same space, a physician writes.
content: Public health and immigration enforcement cannot safely occupy the same space, a physician writes.
